req2: the trainborne equipment shall remain in full supervision until the trainborne equipment is not active any longer, when shunting is selected or when partial supervision information is received.

req1: when the etcs trainborne equipment is isolated, the system shall not show any etcs information other than the fact that the system is isolated.
req2: if supervised by an rbc it shall be possible to command an emergency stop to all trains in a particular area or to a specific train

req1: trains equipped for ertms/etcs application level 3 shall be able to run on lines equipped with ertms/etcs application level 3, 2, 1 and 0, trains equipped for ertms/etcs application level 2 shall be able to run on lines equipped with ertms/etcs application level 2, 1 and 0 and trains equipped for ertms/etcs application level 1 shall be able to run on lines equipped with ertms/etcs application level 1 and 0.
req2: during the transition period between two operational states (including two different national operations) the supervision provided shall at least ensure the same protection provided by the least restrictive state.

req1: if the onboard fails to contact the rbc when awakening the driver shall be asked to enter the rbc contact details
req2: this static train speed profile shall also respect maximum line speed and track speed and special speed levels for special classes of trains.

req2: this static train speed profile shall also respect maximum line speed and track speed and special speed levels for special classes of trains.
